reqs:
Pre-reqs: Either (a) CPSC 310 or (b) one of EECE 310, CPEN 321 and one of EECE 315, CPEN 331.
We are currently trying to find an instructor to teach CPSC 410. The intention is to try to offer it at this time. If you are interested in taking the course please register on the wait list. There are no times associated with the wait so that you have the option of registering in another coruse at this time. If the course is offered priority to the course will follow the rules here: https://www.cs.ubc.ca/students/undergrad/courses/waitlists If moving you from the wait list will result in a course conflict you will be given the opportunity to drop the other course before losing your seat in the course.
We are currently trying to find an instructor to teach CPSC 410. The intention is to try to offer T/Th 11:00 - 12:30. If you are interested in taking the course please register on this wait list. There are no times associated with the wait list so that you have the option of registering in another coruse at this time. If the course is offered, priority to the course will follow the rules here: https://www.cs.ubc.ca/students/undergrad/courses/waitlists If moving you from the wait list will result in a course conflict you will be given the opportunity to drop the other course before losing your seat in the course.
description: Specification, design, construction and validation of multi-version software systems.
